tool_description: This api give you the molecular structure of every chemical element in the periodic table.
title: Molecular Viewer

api_list.name: predict_predit__post
main__get
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://molecular-viewer.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "molecular-viewer.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
